name: Trouble in Bean Land
description:
Hey, hey you! Bean Lands King has been poisoned and we need your help! Our tiny bean brains can't figure out who the murderer is! Ohhhh please can you come help us... We would really appreciate it!!

Trouble in Bean Land was created in Unreal Engine 4 for the "I Can't Write but I want to Make a Story" game jam.

If you want to check out more from me you can follow my twitter at https://twitter.com/TheMattestLong I am going to be posting a lot of game dev / funny bean related stuff

Special thanks to these wonderful people:

Miles for modeling the beans. You can find more of their art here https://www.instagram.com/glamgoths/?hl=en

Sketchers for making the title image

Dekkanoid for making the Bean Land theme. You can view some of their other work here  https://www.youtube.com/user/amfgpie

Wizardman for rigging and voice acting. You can view some of his other work here https://www.redbubble.com/people/wizardman/shop

Pyrus of Impetus for voice acting the Beanologist you can find his twitch here https://m.twitch.tv/pyrusofimpetus/profile

University at Buffalo Improv Comedy Club for voice acting
